00038 #define BOOST_MPL_AUX_VOID_SPEC_PARAMS(i) \
00039     BOOST_MPL_PP_ENUM(i, void_) \
00040 
00041 
00042 #if defined(BOOST_BROKEN_DEFAULT_TEMPLATE_PARAMETERS_IN_NESTED_TEMPLATES)
00043 #   define BOOST_MPL_AUX_VOID_SPEC_ARITY(i, name) \
00044 namespace aux { \
00045 template< BOOST_MPL_AUX_NTTP_DECL(int, N) > \
00046 struct arity< \
00047       name< BOOST_MPL_AUX_VOID_SPEC_PARAMS(i) > \
00048     , N \
00049     > \
00050 { \
00051     BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(int \
00052         , value = BOOST_MPL_METAFUNCTION_MAX_ARITY \
00053         ); \
00054 }; \
00055 } \
00056 
00057 #else
00058 #   define BOOST_MPL_AUX_VOID_SPEC_ARITY(i, name) 
00059 #endif
00060 
00061 #define BOOST_MPL_AUX_VOID_SPEC_MAIN(i, name) \
00062 template<> \
00063 struct name< BOOST_MPL_AUX_VOID_SPEC_PARAMS(i) > \
00064 { \
00065     template< \
00066           BOOST_MPL_PP_PARAMS(i, typename T) \
00067         BOOST_MPL_PP_NESTED_DEF_PARAMS_TAIL(i, typename T, void_) \
00068         > \
00069     struct apply \
00070         : name< BOOST_MPL_PP_PARAMS(i, T) > \
00071     { \
00072     }; \
00073 }; \
00074 
00075 
00076 #if defined(BOOST_MPL_NO_FULL_LAMBDA_SUPPORT)
00077 #   define BOOST_MPL_AUX_VOID_SPEC_LAMBDA(i, name) \
00078 template<> \
00079 struct lambda< \
00080       name< BOOST_MPL_AUX_VOID_SPEC_PARAMS(i) > \
00081     , void_ \
00082     , true \
00083     > \
00084 { \
00085     typedef name< BOOST_MPL_AUX_VOID_SPEC_PARAMS(i) > type; \
00086 }; \
00087 
00088 #else
00089 #   define BOOST_MPL_AUX_VOID_SPEC_LAMBDA(i, name) \
00090 template<> \
00091 struct lambda< \
00092       name< BOOST_MPL_AUX_VOID_SPEC_PARAMS(i) > \
00093     , void_ \
00094     BOOST_MPL_AUX_LAMBDA_ARITY_PARAM(int_<-1>) \
00095     > \
00096 { \
00097     typedef name< BOOST_MPL_AUX_VOID_SPEC_PARAMS(i) > type; \
00098 }; \
00099 
00100 #endif
00101 
00102 #if defined(BOOST_EXTENDED_TEMPLATE_PARAMETERS_MATCHING) || \
00103     defined(BOOST_MPL_NO_FULL_LAMBDA_SUPPORT) && \
00104     defined(BOOST_MPL_BROKEN_OVERLOAD_RESOLUTION)
00105 #   define BOOST_MPL_AUX_VOID_SPEC_TEMPLATE_ARITY(i, j, name) \
00106 namespace aux { \
00107 template< BOOST_MPL_PP_PARAMS(j, typename T) > \
00108 struct template_arity< \
00109       name< BOOST_MPL_PP_PARAMS(j, T) > \
00110     > \
00111 { \
00112     BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(int, value = j); \
00113 }; \
00114 \
00115 template<> \
00116 struct template_arity< \
00117       name< BOOST_MPL_PP_ENUM(i, void_) > \
00118     > \
00119 { \
00120     BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(int, value = -1); \
00121 }; \
00122 } \
00123 
00124 #else
00125 #   define BOOST_MPL_AUX_VOID_SPEC_TEMPLATE_ARITY(i, j, name) 
00126 #endif
